verse: The Lord God ·made this promise [has sworn by himself]; the Lord God ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts] says:
·At that time there might be only [If there are] ten people left alive in just one house, but they will also die.

When the relatives come to take the bodies out of the house to ·bury them [or burn them; or anoint them for burial], one of them will call to ·the other [or any survivors] and ask, “Are there any other dead bodies with you?”
